channel.title: Articles on morita naoki
channel.description: Recent content in Articles on morita naoki

item.title: Speech at Applestore Ginza
item.description: I talked about the secret of making UX to improve the user experience of iOS applications at AppleStore Ginza. 【Cookpad✕Wantedly】ユーザ体験を向上させるUXづくりの秘訣 ココロオドルUX from Naoki Morita

item.title: I won CROOZ Ibeacon Hackathon
item.description: I won the Grand Prix in the hackathon held in CROOZ office on Jun 28th. テックヒルズ×iBeacon ハッカソン【ハンズオンも同時開催】 The hackathon is to make an iOS application using iBeacon installed in various places in CROOZ office in one day. Finally, I ran around CROOZ and made a 3 and a half minutes demo movie. It was easy to detect a beacon, but the detection rate is bad. So, I changed the implementation slightly.

item.title: I won the Grand Prix in Qiita Hackathon
item.description: I won the Qiita hackathon held on Nov. 9th. You can see the scene in Qiita Blog. As a prize, I got iPad mini Retina Display model and Amazon gift card 10,000yen. At that day, the camera of WBS(World Business Satellite), Japanese business news broadcasting service was there, so, I debuted to the tv news. Because it was my first hackathon, I was very nervous and I didn’t know it succeeds until the end.
